Event: school is so pointlesss. seriously though. 7 days of school left and all we do is watch movies and make powerpoints. let me leaveeee
Post: "I'm so done with school. Like, seriously, what's the point? We're just wasting our time watching movies and making powerpoints. I mean, I get it, education is important and all, but can't we just learn something useful for once? Like how to file taxes or cook a decent meal? But no, instead, we're stuck in this prison cell of a classroom, forced to listen to some boring teacher drone on and on about stuff we'll never remember. And don't even get me started on the homework. Like, seriously, who has time for that? I have better things to do, like scroll through TikTok or play video games. But no, I have to waste my precious time on boring math problems and essays that no one will ever read. And don't even get me started on the standardized tests. Like, what's the point of those? We're all just going to forget the material as soon as we walk out of the testing room. It's like, why bother? But hey, at least we have some sweet Instagram filters to show for it. #SAS #StableAttributionalStyle #SchoolSucks"
